name: Clouds of Fire
description:
WARNING: This video game has many on screen flashes and may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy.


Shoot-em-up meets Rouge-lite, in this challenging arcade throwback.

  • Fly through 4 different levels as you take on an endless supply of enemies who receive random upgrades each wave  for a constantly evolving challenge. 
  • Physics: Enemy planes will careen into each other causing massive chains of explosions and chaos, even bullets will ricochet of each other!
  •  Collect fuel to unlock 20 pilots and passive upgrades to better your runs permanently and unlock dozens of upgrades within each run. 
  • Unlock 7 planes with completely different play styles from stats to special abilities and pair them with each pilot for countless play-styles and strategies.
  • Second Chances: When your plane is shot down you can launch your ejector to take over enemy ships and continue playing 
  •  Endless: See how far you can go with new game plus runs every-time you win, constantly getting harder and evolving.
